alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hendry, central Palm Beach and southwestern Glades Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moore Haven, moving east at 125 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Labelle, Moore Haven, Lake Harbor, Montura, Palmdale, Royal Palm Beach, Okeelanta, Loxahatchee NWR, Belle Glade Camp, Port La Belle, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, Ortona and Fremd Village-Padgett Island. TIME...MOT...LOC 1833Z 286DEG 110KT 2675 8111 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
